statements: SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT access_level FROM permissions WHERE participant_id = 2;
SELECT participant_id, access_level FROM permissions ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM permissions;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT access_level FROM permissions WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE access_level LIKE '%User%';
SELECT participant_id, access_level FROM permissions WHERE access_level = 'Editor' ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_permissions FROM permissions;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants;
SELECT participant_name, access_level FROM blockchain_participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name FROM blockchain_participants WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_id > 3;
SELECT permission_name, permission_description FROM access_permissions WHERE access_level_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM access_permissions;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_id > 3 ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, access_level FROM blockchain_participants WHERE access_level='Admin';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants INNER JOIN access_permissions ON blockchain_participants.participant_id = access_permissions.access_level_id;

SELECT participant_name AS participant, permission_name AS permission FROM blockchain_participants JOIN access_permissions ON blockchain_participants.participant_id = access_permissions.access_level_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_participants;
SELECT participant_name, access_level FROM blockchain_network_participants;
SELECT * FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_name = 'Admin';
SELECT participant_name FROM blockchain_network_participants ORDER BY access_level DESC;

SELECT participant_name, permission_name FROM blockchain_network_participants JOIN participant_permissions ON blockchain_network_participants.participant_id = participant_permissions.participant_id JOIN access_permissions ON participant_permissions.permission_id = access_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_participants WHERE access_level = 'Admin';

SELECT participant_name, access_level, permission_name FROM blockchain_network_participants JOIN participant_permissions ON blockchain_network_participants.participant_id = participant_permissions.participant_id JOIN access_permissions ON participant_permissions.permission_id = access_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT participant_name, access_level FROM blockchain_network_participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;

SELECT participant_name, permission_name FROM blockchain_network_participants JOIN participant_permissions ON blockchain_network_participants.participant_id = participant_permissions.participant_id JOIN access_permissions ON participant_permissions.permission_id = access_permissions.permission_id WHERE access_level = 'User';
SELECT * FROM access_permissions WHERE description IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT p.permission_id, u.username, r.role_name FROM permissions p JOIN users u ON p.role = u.role JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT participant_id, user_id, permission_id FROM blockchain_participants ORDER BY permission_id DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT role_id, role_name, description FROM roles WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM blockchain_role_permissions ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, access_level FROM blockchain_user_permissions WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT network_name, permissions FROM blockchain_network_permissions WHERE network_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM blockchain_user_roles ORDER BY user_id ASC, role_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, access_level FROM blockchain_user_permissions
SELECT role_name FROM blockchain_role_permissions ORDER BY role_id DESC
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM blockchain_user_roles WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT network_name, permissions FROM blockchain_network_permissions WHERE permissions LIKE '%read%'
SELECT role_id, network_id FROM blockchain_role_network ORDER BY role_id ASC, network_id DESC
